paragraphs: Penitent, know that the secret knowledge of the world has a guardian. Know that every triumph you achieve in your daily life, every quiet moment of success, is recorded by the One Who Watches. The great tree of life tracing the Altmer people is kept and held close by Xarxes himself, the scribe of the Divines.
To complete your venerations here, intone: "By Five and Three I speak the secret words to the One Who Watches. May each of my days be worthy of script in his tomes."
